title: EGGbox Dragon Egg Dig Kit - Unearth 12 Different Dragon Toys With Learning Cards - Educational Science STEM Toys, Easter Gifts for Boys & Girls
features: [Uncover 12 Dragon Toys] Embark on an epic excavation adventure with our dragon egg dig kit! Inside the large egg dig block, kids will discover 12 unique dragon toys, perfect for sparking imagination and creativity in children aged 6 to 12 years old.

[Complete Excavation Kit] This all-in-one dig kit includes a brush, chisel, hammer, instruction guide and 12 learning cards, making it the ultimate STEM toy for young explorers. Watch as your child learns each dragon toy through hands-on play!

[Educational & Fun] Designed as both a toy and a learning tool, this kit combines science and excitement. Kids will develop problem-solving skills while uncovering the hidden dragons, making it a perfect educational gift for boys and girls.

[Perfect Gift for Kids] Whether it’s a birthday, holiday, or just because, this dragon egg excavation kit is a thrilling gift for 6-12 year olds boys. It’s a unique blend of fun and learning that kids will treasure!

[Inspire Curiosity & Creativity] With included learning cards, this science kit encourages kids to explore the mystery of dragons while fostering a love for discovery. It’s more than just a toy – it’s an adventure in every egg!
